Class TileLayerState

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.client.map.LayerState
us.mn.state.dot.tms.client.map.TileLayerState
public class TileLayerState extends LayerState
A tile layer state for drawing a Google-style tile map.

Douglas Lau
